beer.beer_description: This one's a nod to the perfect pavlova - sweet, fruity, and full of that irresistible contrast. Kiwi, strawberry, and passionfruit combine in a tart juicy sour that captures all the magic of the dessert. It's the smooth, tangy goodness you love, no sporks needed - it's mum's pav ramped up to 100.

items.badge_description: You’ve unlocked today’s Recappd badge! Any drink you check in helps power your faction as we race toward choosing the next Untappd icon. Explore your year in beer at Recappd and come back tomorrow! Recappd is presented by Crescent Canna: Try the bestselling THC drinks in the country and get FREE THC gummies with your purchase. Add any THC drink to your cart and use code: GUMTAPPD. Shop Now >

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 310 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 63!

Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 195 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 40.
It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 170 different fruited beers. Try 5 more for Level 35!

items.checkin_comment: Cc4 - bit lactose creamy and some tangy strawbs kicking about. Nice without being too much

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
